content: **knitted top/singlet in drops paris the piece is worked top down with straps rib v-neck and i-cord sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #hiddencreektop drops design pattern w-936 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl the piece is quite elastic due to the ribbing and will be smaller than the measurements in the chart work the size you normally use as it will stretch when worn **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 29 ice blue **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm drops cable needle **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
